summary: Removes the \"fin\" thingy from the back of the Bonemold helm in the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
No one was doing this. So.

This is a mesh edit/replacer form the vanilla Bonemold helmet. Male and female support. Works with any retexture.

It\'s not perfect. Some clipping might occur with the female versions.

Edits
-Rounds off the back and brings the spiky cheekbones in.


I made this after seeing JKalenad\'s Light Bonemold Armor - Fully Integrated. Check it.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34138

The idea of a \"lighter\" version of the armor sounded cool.

Don\'t expect a stand alone version from me. My CK is busted.

Requires Dragonborn.
author: Kyim
